category.item: The cache has been successfully emptied.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: The usergroup has been successfully added.
{if $deletedGroups == 1}This usergroup has{else}{#$deletedGroups} These usergroups have{/if} been successfully deleted.
Your usergroup changes have been successfully saved.
您當前是系統管理組的成員, 更改該用戶組成員許可權可能導致您無法正常使用系統設置功能, 請小心操作!
啟用該選項可以賦予該用戶組成員進入系統設置的許可權, 進入系統設置後臺後, 根據許可權不同, 該組成員可以進行不同的管理操作.
Members of this usergroup can view private user options.
啟用該選項, 該用戶組成員可以修改系統設置, 例如: 開啟/關閉論壇.
Members of this usergroup can view the system logs.
該用戶組成員是否可以編輯升級伺服器.
該用戶組成員是否可以安裝模組.
該用戶組成員是否可以刪除模組.
該用戶組成員是否可以升級模組.
該組成員可以編輯下列用戶組的許可權. 例如, 您可以在此設置該組成員是否有許可權編輯自身資料.
該用戶組成員是否可以添加用戶組.
該組成員是否可以添加新用戶. 如果 "編輯用戶組許可權" 啟用, 則當添加用戶的時候, "編輯用戶組許可權" 的選項也可以被賦值.
該用戶組成員是否可以刪除用戶組.
該用戶組成員是否可以刪除用戶.
該用戶組成員是否可以編輯用戶組.
該用戶組成員是否可以編輯用戶E-Mail.
該用戶組成員是否可以編輯用戶密碼.
該用戶組成員是否可以編輯用戶.
該用戶組成員是否可以查看其他會員的 E-Mail 並給他們發郵件.
該用戶組成員是否可以搜索用戶和用戶資料.

category.name: wcf.acp.masterPassword
category.item: This page or action requires you to enter the master password due to security reasons. You only need to do so once within a session. If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The master password is not correct.If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The entered passwords are not identically.

The password is not secure. It has to contain at least eight characters, small and capital latin letters as well as numbers and special characters. It must not be identically with passwords of administrators of this page.

The master password is an additional protection of functions that are relevant to security. You should use a very secure password that must not be identically with your normal administrator password, unknown to others and not used on other websites.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter one hostname each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter one IP address each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter one user agent each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter the address of the memcache server! You can enter one server each row.
By enabling this option a persistent connection to the memcache server will be used.
Please select the type of cache you want to use! Some of the types have special requirements to the server system and cannot be used in your environment.

Memcache stores data in the memory that is often accessed. This may reduce the database load dramatically. Read more about the memcache on the following site:
  • www.danga.com/memcached/
You can configure optional proxy servers for connections to external servers.

Internet pages are often attacted by programs and robots. It is possible for example to create hundreds of user accounts automatically. You can protect yourself against these spam bots with the help of a so called captcha image on every place where web forms can be submitted. Unregistered users then have to identify the code on the captcha first before they can submit the form. Robots cannot read the code. Please not that captcha images cannot be read by blind and visually impaired people.

Cookie 所影響的功能變數名稱。修改此選項預設值最常見的原因是，您的論壇有兩個不同的網址，例如 standme.com 和 forum.standme.com. 要使用戶在以兩個不同的功能變數名稱訪問論壇時，都能保持登錄狀態，您需要將此選項設置為 .standme.com (注意功能變數名稱需要以點開頭).
注意：若您不能肯定，最好將此處留空。輸入錯誤的設置會導致您無法登錄論壇。

Cookie 保存的路徑。如果您在同一個功能變數名稱下運行了多個論壇, 便需要將它設置為每個論壇所在的目錄名. 否則, 填寫 / 便可以了. 請注意，此處必須以斜杠結尾, 比如“/forums/”、“/wbb3/”等.
注意：輸入錯誤的設置會導致您無法登錄論壇.
您可以設置您的論壇 Cookie 使用特定的首碼.
系統始終是否自動調整夏令/冬令時?
Use cache method for session data
Should the selected cache method be used to save the session data?
Download the exported options as a backup file to your local machine.
啟用該選項則允許論壇向流覽器的發送的HTTP頭部請求標記文檔的媒體類型為 application/xhtml+xml.

選擇“是”將使用 GZIP HTML 壓縮輸出給用戶頁面，這會減少帶寬要求。這項功能要求用戶端流覽器的支持，以及 HTTP 1.1 相容。它會產生伺服器額外的性能開銷。
這項功能要求 ZLIB 庫支持。
如果您已經在伺服器上使用了mod_gzip，請不要打開這個選項。
啟用這個選項將限制流覽器對頁面進行緩存.
設置 GZIP 在輸出時的壓縮級別: 0=無壓縮, 9=最大壓縮比. 我們強烈推薦您使用級別 1.
The options have been imported successfully.
Upload the options to be imported from your local machine.
在這裏輸入Debug 日誌檔的路徑
輸入用於發送郵件的 E-Mails.
輸入一個名字, 以便您的用戶知道是誰給他發的郵件, 可以直接填寫論壇名稱.
選擇一個郵件發送方式.
Enter here a signature that should be sent with system e-mails.
輸入SMTP 郵件伺服器的埠.
輸入SMTP 郵件伺服器的用戶名
一些 Sendmail 伺服器在 PHP 發送郵件時需要“-f”參數, 如果您遇到這樣的問題, 用戶收不到從論壇發出的郵件, 試試打開這個選項.
啟用該選項, 發件人和收件人的郵件地址將被格式化為 "Name <email@domain.tld>". 的格式. 但並非所有的郵件伺服器都支援該選項, 當郵件發送出現問題的時候請關閉該選項.
Pages and forms within the admin panel that are relevant to security can be protected with an additional master password.
在這裏設置用戶的Session 作用時間. 單位：秒.
The number of block of an ip address that should be checked while reading the session data. A high number can exclude users that use changing IP addresses.
Should the user agent be checked while reading the session data?
Your option changes have been successfully saved.
設置您網站所在地方的時區.
統計線上列表的時間範圍, 超過這個時間沒有任何活動, 其用戶名會從線上用戶列表中刪除. 單位：秒.

category.name: wcf.acp.package
category.item: 輸入 FTP 的登錄資訊
如果您的伺服器開啟了PHP安全模式, 則論壇模組的安裝需要FTP功能的支援. 請輸入該伺服器的FTP用戶名和密碼, 此次您輸入的FTP用戶名和密碼僅用於此次論壇模組安裝而不被記錄, 因此, 您安裝另外的論壇模組的時候還需要再次輸入該資訊.
根據您輸入的FTP資訊, 無法建立FTP連接, 請檢查您輸入的資訊.
您確認要取消模組安裝?
該模組的模組需求無法滿足.

The {if $action == 'install'}package installation{else}package update{/if} of package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion} cannot be executed due to incompatibilities with the following {if $excludedPackages|count == 1}package{else}packages{/if}:

{if $excludingPackages|count == 1}Following package doesn't{else}Following packages don't{/if} allow the {if $action == 'install'}package installation{else}package update{/if} of package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion} due to incompatibilities:

{if $excludingPackages|count == 1}Following package is{else}Following packages are{/if} incompatible with package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion}. If you proceed installation the {if $excludingPackages|count == 1}package{else}packages{/if} probably won't work anymore.
{$package.name} ({if $package.open == 0}被安裝{else}{if $package.file|isset}在該模組中{else}不可用{/if}{/if})
您確認取消該模組的安裝?
通過該模組下列模組可以更新
選擇下列模組的一個來更新它的版本, 如果您想要再次安裝該模組, 請點擊 "{lang}wcf.global.button.next{/lang}" 按鈕.
該模組已經存在於已安裝模組列表中. 如果您點繼續則將再安裝一個該模組的副本. 如果您想要更新一個該模組的可用拷貝, 請從下面列表中選擇.
While unpacking the files of this package the following error occured:
The following files could not be unpacked successfully. Please check if the destination folder is writable.
不覆蓋資料表(此次安裝不需再次詢問).
覆蓋資料表(此次安裝不需再次詢問).
安裝該模組時與以下資料表衝突. 請選擇是否覆蓋這些資料表.
該模組包含以下附加模組, 請選擇您要安裝的模組.
已有其他程式被安裝在該檔夾中.
該檔夾已被 WoltLab Community Framework 使用. 請選擇另外的檔夾.
This application is accessable through the following URL after installation in this folder:
當前模組需要其他模組的支援, 請選擇您所需的模組.
所選模組不是有效的安裝例行.
您給出的檔不是一個有效的模組檔.
模組 "{$package->getName()}" 無法通過您給出的檔來更新.
您給出的文件夾內無文件.
所選模組已被安裝. 模組不可被安裝多次.
請輸入您伺服器上的模組檔路徑(相對路徑), 支援遠端檔(http://...).
請從您的電腦選擇模組檔.
安裝系統設置功能表選項 ...
Installing template patches for the Administration Control Panel ...
Removing template patches of the Administration Control Panel ...
Updating template patches in the Administration Control Panel ...
該模組補丁安裝失敗因為該補丁和模組不匹配. 因此該模組無法被安裝. 請點擊 "{lang}wcf.acp.package.install.cancel{/lang}" 按鈕.

為下列範本打補丁失敗:
{foreach from=$failures item=$failure}{$failure.templateName} (Originally patched by: {$failure.packageName})
{/foreach}預先安裝的模組補丁似乎已經無效. 您應當點擊 "{lang}wcf.global.button.next{/lang}" 按鈕繼續完成升級過程.
該模組補丁移除失敗因為原始檔案已經更改. 因此該模組無法被移除. 請單擊 "{lang}wcf.acp.package.uninstall.cancel{/lang}" 按鈕.
無法移除該模組, 因為該模組被不止一個其他模組需要.
經過最後確認, 下列模組將被卸載.
該模組被其他 {#$dependentPackages|count} 個模組所需求.
該模組被其他{#$dependentPackages|count} 個模組所需求.
該模組需要 {#$requiredPackages|count} 個其他模組的支援.

The chosen action has been executed successfully on {#$affectedUsers} users.

The bulk processor will perform the following tasks without additional security notification, on all users matching the set conditions. Bulk processing can be very performance intensive, so should only be executed when the forum is offline. To have a correct display of your content you should update the counters. The processing can not be reversed, so please be attentive when using this function.

Here you can enter the sender's e-mail address in the following format:

{if MAIL_USE_FORMATTED_ADDRESS}Senders name <email@sender.tld>{else}email@sender.tld{/if}

If you have completely filled in the section under System -> Options -> E-mail, then this field will automatically be filled in. If you are sending e-mails using SMTP, then the sender's e-mail-Address must also be accepted by the Server.
